text: residential property pool cover or net required a mortgagee in possession of a foreclosed residential property unoccupied for or more days shall secure the surface of any pool spa or other water feature structure greater than square feet located on the premises of the residential property with a cover or net approved by the american society for testing materials astm this requirement shall not apply to any surface waters on the property including but not limited to watercourses lakes ponds marshes or tidal waters
